lenders.name: Ginni
lenders.loan_because: I'm a sucker. Kiva no longer gets new money from me, and won't as long as blood sport loans (cockfighting, dog fighting, etc.) are allowed. Our money does NOT go to the person we select, but to the mfi. Check the Date Disbursed - 99% of the time the borrower has already received his or her loan. I still roll over my repayment money... for now.

lenders.name: Jerome
lenders.loan_because: I loan through Kiva because it gives hard working entrepreneurs a hand up, which is more empowering than a handout.  By contributing loans to Kiva, you are literally “helping others help themselves”.

lenders.name: Ravi

lenders.loan_because:
Hello my name us Deolinda Oliveira.
I am Portuguese and heard about you on TV, and this means I ask for your help.
I am divorced.I am 44 years, I have a maid salary of 500 €. I have a housing credit in the bank Caixa Geral de Depositos from 500 € obviously can not pay the entire benefit, has repeatedly have asked me to drop the provision and has not been able to do this, do not fall I ask if you can help me it does not want to lose my house, and heard the story qu great people has helped you please help me. Thank you for this time.
I look forward with the best response lengths
Deolinda Oliveira
Contact: 912181851

lenders.name: Christian

People in different countries should connect and work together through the internet to accomplish common goals.

Also because it is a good investment and I know that Kiva enterpreneurs will use the money wisely.

lenders.name: Susanna
lenders.loan_because:
It's a small thing - just $25 to assist another woman to make a better life for herself and her family. 

In the normal course of events I would never even know of these women and how they courageously struggle to raise themselves from poverty.
lenders.occupational_info:
OK, so I can't change the world. I would prefer if all the war budgets aimed at slaughtering each other were used instead to create a world where  everyone had proper food,  housing, education and health care. A world where social justice for all was the norm. But it's not. 

Making a micro loan through Kiva is one small action I can take. One thing I CAN do.

I'm a member of the Red Hats on the Yarra group, we  make loans to women who don't have the resources which we take for granted.  

Do yourself a favour and join us. You don't have to be a Red Hatter, you don't even have to live in Melbourne! All you need is a heart  - and the vision to see that Kiva is NOT a charity but a self-help scheme.

Providing support to entrepreneurs in developing countries will help to stimulate their local economy and may lead to the creation of jobs. This would lead to an improvement in the lives of people in the area and not just for the entrepreneur themselves. I believe that supporting entrepreneurs would be the catalyst needed for longer term economic change.

lenders.name: Ruth
lenders.loan_because: "we make a living by what we earn, but we make a life by what we give" -Winston Churchill

lenders.name: Will
lenders.loan_because:
Kiva is Win-Win on steroids!

Kiva personally permits me 
(1) to flexibly and effectively battle poverty
(2) one on one 
(3) funding only the needy I can afford 
(4) using a revolving account
(5) at little or no cost or even risk to me.  

Kiva communily 
(5) builds and betters humanity 
(6) with small, humble endeavers 
(7) that enable my entrepreneurs to achieve a successful future for all.  

Since 2008, the meager $1407 I have invested has financed more than 160 loans--some as the sole source--measurably bettering the lives of hundreds of the most needy and enterprising. I only regret that I cannot command more resources to personally brighten the eyes of every Kiva prospect I view who seeks only a very humble investment to resurrect his/her life one step at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired, disabled and modestly alone in a small home by the sea. How privileged I am to individually and intimately lighten--however slight--the dark cross of poverty from the shoulders of my entrepreneurs whose burdens I have never experienced.

lenders.name: cathy
lenders.loan_because: We are all connected.

lenders.name: Lorraine

lenders.occupational_info: My work is manufacturing cosmetics. I also have website, sales, and marketing resonsibilities of the business.

lenders.occupational_info: I record payments made to a newspaper and answer customers questions about thier bills

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: Someone helped me to get started, when I wasn't a "good bet". Now that I'm successful and I have the opportunity, I am "paying it forward" to help those who could benefit from my help. I hope the people I help will one day do the same, and help others as well.
